messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

route between the and dc ad tm com wednesday march pm re route form hello please advised checked engineers ad tm also suggested maybe help kind regards analyst wednesday march pm re route form hello senior engineers advised second kind regards analyst ext hub wednesday march pm route form hello please take advise help thanks kind regards analyst wednesday march route form hi please setup route ad tm seems available other offices think benefit well thank senior infrastructure consultant

**Evaluating the Best Category**

**Categorizing Network Configuration**
